name: Full Payment Upfront
Description: Buyer pays the full cost upfront.

name: Installment Plan (Monthly Payments)
Description: Buyer pays in equal monthly installments.

name: Down Payment + Financing
Description: Buyer makes a down payment and finances the rest.

name: Lease Agreement
Description: Buyer leases the car for a set period, with an option to buy.

name: Cash on Delivery (COD)
Description: Buyer pays the full amount in cash upon delivery.
